TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed PagerButtons extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定为在已分页的控件中的内容页之间导航而显示的按钮的类型。

span.span: Specifies the types of buttons to display for navigating between pages of content in a paginated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 枚举表示的按钮以显示为已分页的控件中的内容页之间导航的类型。The enumeration represents the types of buttons to display for navigating between pages of content in a paginated control. 此枚举由属性来指定要在中显示的导航按钮类型控制使用类，如和。This enumeration is used by the property to specify the type of navigation buttons to display in controls that use the class, such as and . `PagerButtons.NextPrevious` 显示**下一步**和**上一步**按钮来访问已分页的控件的下一步和前一页。`PagerButtons.NextPrevious` displays **Next** and **Previous** buttons to access the next and previous pages of the paginated control. `PagerButtons.NextPreviousFirstLast` 显示**下一步**和**上一步**按钮，以及**第一个**和**最后一个**按钮以直接访问的第一个和最后一页分页的控件。`PagerButtons.NextPreviousFirstLast` displays **Next** and **Previous** buttons as well as **First** and **Last** buttons to directly access the first and last pages of the paginated control. `PagerButtons.Numeric` 显示已分页的控件的页相对应的数值链接按钮。`PagerButtons.Numeric` displays numeric link buttons corresponding to the pages of the paginated control. `PagerButtons.NumericFirstLast` 显示已分页的控件的页相对应的数值链接按钮，以及**第一个**和**最后一个**按钮以直接访问已分页的控件的第一个和最后一个页面。`PagerButtons.NumericFirstLast` displays numeric link buttons corresponding to the pages of the paginated control as well as **First** and **Last** buttons to directly access the first and last pages of the paginated control.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagerButtons NextPrevious = int32(0)

summary.span: 一组由“上一页”和“下一页”按钮组成的分页控件。

span.span: A set of pagination controls consisting of **Previous** and **Next** buttons.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagerButtons NextPreviousFirstLast = int32(2)

summary.span: 一组由“上一页”、“下一页”、“首页”和“尾页”按钮组成的分页控件。

span.span: A set of pagination controls consisting of **Previous**, **Next**, **First**, and **Last** buttons.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagerButtons Numeric = int32(1)

summary.span: 一组由用于直接访问页的带编号的链接按钮组成的分页控件。

span.span: A set of pagination controls consisting of numbered link buttons to access pages directly.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagerButtons NumericFirstLast = int32(3)

summary.span: 一组由带编号的链接按钮以及“首页”和“尾页”链接按钮组成的分页控件。

span.span: A set of pagination controls consisting of numbered and **First** and **Last** link buttons.
